parameters.subject: Confirmation message
parameters.message: =Hi {{ $('Create or update a contact').item.json.properties.hs_full_name_or_email.value }}, thanks for calling!

call.agent_name: AI Voice Agent for Apex India Bazaar
call.transcript:
Agent: Hi, thanks for calling India Bazaar. This is Siri—how can I help you today?
User: hii
Agent: Hello! How can I assist you today?
User: I want to book a table
Agent: Great! I can help you with that. What date would you like to make the reservation for?
User: today
Agent: Perfect! What time would you prefer for your reservation today?
User: 7pm
Agent: Got it! How many people will be in your party?
User: 6
Agent: Thank you! Can I have your name, please, for the reservation?
User: mahesh
Agent: Thank you, Mahesh! And could you please provide a phone number in case we need to reach you?
User: 6292573730
Agent: Thanks, Mahesh! Can I have your email address, please?
User: peacefulmusic62@gmail.com
Agent: Just to confirm, I have a reservation for Mahesh, for 6 people today at 7 PM, and we’ll reach you at 6292573730. Is everything correct?
User: yes
